comment.author: 33007063@N04
comment._content: The correct name of this building is Palazzo Termite.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi Salvatore,

Thanks for the spelling correction. Many of the labels have handwritten descriptions and we do our best to try to decipher them. We will add your correction to our records. 

Angie, Brooklyn Museum Archives
